section.title: Requirements Version 0.1.0
section.para: The first minor version must be able to create and save a project, import and playback audio data.

listitem.para: Must be able to create a new project, save its state and reopen it.
Must be able to open multiple projects at once.
Must be able to audition and import audio files into the project.
Must be able to create and delete audio tracks.
Must display audio files in an audio track in the edit window.
Must be able to playback audio tracks.
Must be able to control the volume of individual tracks.

section.title: Requirements Version 0.2.0
section.para: Object Selection(Arrow) Tool. Implement the fundamental editing operations supported by the Object Selection tool that apply to Audio events.

listitem.para: Must be able to select Audio Event objects
Must be able to move audio events to new positions on a tracks timeline
Must be able to copy an audio event to the same or different track

section.title: Requirements Version 0.3.0
section.para: Support for non-destructive spliting and joining of audio events. This will mean introducting Audio parts.

listitem.para: Must be able to split an audio event into two distinct audio events.
Must be able to join two audio events into an audio part.
